CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 28, 1953, pg. 26, reads: "Popular Champion - Henry Hickman, one of the most popular entries in Golden Glove Tournament just completed here, was all smiles as he received a trophy designating him as the top boxer in the tourney. The promising youngster is a member of the Ledbetter A. C.  - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Man presenting trophy to Golden Gloves champion Henry Hickman, in boxing ring with another boxer standing on right
